articles.description: Experts believe that the new disclosure requirements for rich South Africans’ possessions are an indication that a wealth tax may be introduced.
articles.content:
BUSINESS
This year’s budget document proposes that, in future, South Africans with business interests and assets of more than R50 million declare those assets and liabilities at market value.
